verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:5
verses.text: Defraud ye not one the other, except it be with consent for a time, that ye may give yourselves to fasting and prayer; and come together again, that Satan tempt you not for your incontinency.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:6
verses.text: But I speak this by permission, and not of commandment.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:7
verses.text: For I would that all men were even as I myself. But every man hath his proper gift of God, one after this manner, and another after that.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:8
verses.text: I say therefore to the unmarried and widows, It is good for them if they abide even as I.
